content: Contact | Damir Cavar’s Homepage Contact Associate Professor, Indiana University at Bloomington (IU) ORCID: https://orcid.org/0000-0002-1262-5927 Directing the Natural Language Processing Lab and organizing the Quantum AI and NLP Study group. phone: +1 (812) 856-5094 (or via Signal, Teams, Zoom) email: dcavar at the domain where we all are, here at IU (iu.edu) (GNUPG key) communication: Signal, Element, LinkedIn, Call sign KD9POS code: GitHub publications: ACL Anthology, NLP-Lab, local: publications and talks office hours: During the semester Thursdays 1:00-2:00 PM in my Ballantine Hall 511 My research is inspired by Steve Jobs’ vision from 1985. talk at the IU Indianapolis Artificial Intelligence & Informatics Consortium (AI2) Events on the 22nd of October 2025, “Toward dynamic surveillance of drug communication on social media: From descriptive insights to predictive modeling with AI architectures,” on analyzing social media data using AI Agentive Models, Knowledge Graphs, Large Language Models, Ontologies, and how to expand existing resources from the National Institute on Drug Abuse (NIDA) Drugs dictionary with new street terminology and insights generated from drug abuse posts on social media. Topics: AI, NLP, Reasoning in Medical Research Applications I was organizing the Quantum AI and NLP Conference 2025 at Indiana University in August 2025. Activities I launched the environment for Natural Language Qu Kit (NLQK), a Quantum NLP (QNLP) library - GitHub repo, PyPi project, website together with the Quantum Study Group team. The weekly NLP-Lab meetings continue during Summer 2025: Details about meeting times and location can be found on the website.
